p: In the ascending order of polarity, walnut stem bark was extracted using different solvents, including petroleum ether, benzene, chloroform, acetone, methanol, ethanol, and distilled water. The methanolic extract showed significant activity against Aspergillus niger (A. niger). Acetone extract significantly inhibited the growth of Alternaria alternata ( A. alternata), and chloroform extract exhibited promising activity against Trichoderma virens ( T. virens) and Fusarium solani ( F. solani) [ 151].
